thread.title: BRIEF-Wing Lee Property Investments ‍Expects To Record Increase In Profit For Year 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Wing Lee Property Investments ‍Expects To Record Increase In Profit For Year 2017

organizations.name: reuters) - wing lee property investments ltd

text:
Jan 12 (Reuters) - Wing Lee Property Investments Ltd :
* ‍EXPECTS TO RECORD INCREASE IN PROFIT FOR YEAR 2017 * EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO EXPECTED NET INCREASE IN FAIR VALUES OF INVESTMENT PROPERTIES FOR YEAR ENDED DEC 31, 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
